item.title: Cardhu Gold Reserve Cask Selection
item.description: Cardhu Gold Reserve Cask Selection is a single malt whisky from the Cardhu whisky distillery (located in the Speyside region). Rated an average of 4.7 out of 5 by 282 reviewers and available from Amazon for only Â£34.95, falling slightly short of liquid gold but this in a solid everyday single malt whisky.
